tools.name: get_profile
tools.description: Get basic profile information including name, tagline, links, and contact info. Always available.

tools.name: get_projects
tools.description: Get list of projects, optionally filtered by tag. Always available.

tag.description: Optional tag to filter projects by (e.g., 'typescript', 'ai')

featured_only.description: If true, only return featured projects

tools.name: get_writing
tools.description: Get list of articles, blog posts, and other writing. Always available.

limit.description: Maximum number of posts to return

tools.name: get_experience
tools.description: Get work experience history. Requires guestbook entry or Agent Token.

current_only.description: If true, only return current position(s)

tools.name: get_skills
tools.description: Get technical skills organized by category. Requires guestbook entry or Agent Token.

tools.name: leave_message
tools.description: Leave a message in the guestbook. Unlocks access to gated tools for this session.

message.description: Your message or reason for visiting

contact.description: Optional contact info if you'd like a response

access_levels.free: Available to all agents without authentication
access_levels.gated: Requires leave_message() call or valid Agent-Token header
